sentences: Yuri Izrael, IPCC Vice-Chair, introduced a proposal for an IPCC technical paper on levels of greenhouse gases in the atmosphere preventing dangerous anthropogenic interference with the climate system.

Chair Watson recalled that this proposal had been presented to the IPCC Bureau, which had decided to request a scoping paper for consideration at IPCC-19. Delegates also briefly considered priorities for future work.
Chair Watson noted that an in-depth discussion on this issue will take place at IPCC-19.
